info.title: Statutory Instruments API
info.description: An API exposing details of the various types of Statutory Instruments laid before Parliament.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Business item with the ID specified

parameters.name: LaidPaper
parameters.description: Business item by laid paper type

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Procedure with the ID specified

get.summary: Returns a list of proposed negative statutory instruments.

parameters.name: Name
parameters.description: Proposed negative statutory instruments with the name provided

parameters.name: RecommendedForProcedureChange
parameters.description: Proposed negative statutory instruments recommended for procedure change

parameters.name: DepartmentId
parameters.description: Proposed negative statutory instruments with the department ID specified

parameters.name: LayingBodyId
parameters.description: Proposed negative statutory instruments with the laying body ID specified

parameters.name: Skip
parameters.description: The number of records to skip from the first, default is 0

parameters.name: Take
parameters.description: The number of records to return, default is 20

get.summary: Returns proposed negative statutory instrument by ID.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Proposed negative statutory instrument with the ID specified

get.summary: Returns business items belonging to a proposed negative statutory instrument.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Business items belonging to proposed negative statutory instrument with the ID specified

get.summary: Returns a list of statutory instruments.

parameters.name: Name
parameters.description: Statutory instruments with the name specified

parameters.name: StatutoryInstrumentType
parameters.description: Statutory instruments where the statutory instrument type is the type provided

parameters.name: ScheduledDebate
parameters.description: Statutory instrument which contains a scheduled debate

parameters.name: MotionToStop
parameters.description: Statutory instruments which contains a motion to stop

parameters.name: ConcernsRaisedByCommittee
parameters.description: Statutory instruments which contains concerns raised by committee

parameters.name: ParliamentaryProcessConcluded
parameters.description: Statutory instruments where the parliamentary process is concluded or notconcluded

parameters.name: DepartmentId
parameters.description: Statutory instruments with the department ID specified

parameters.name: LayingBodyId
parameters.description: Statutory instruments with the laying body ID specified

parameters.name: House
parameters.description: Statutory instruments laid in the house specified

parameters.name: Skip
parameters.description: The number of records to skip from the first, default is 0

parameters.name: Take
parameters.description: The number of records to return, default is 20

get.summary: Returns a statutory instrument by ID.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Statutory instrument with the ID specified

get.summary: Returns business items belonging to statutory instrument with ID.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Business items belonging to statutory instrument with the ID specified

parameters.name: Id
parameters.description: Acts of Parliament with the IDs specified.

parameters.name: Name
parameters.description: Acts of Parliament with the name specified.

get.summary: Search individual Act of Parliament by ID
Search through statutory instruments and proposed negatives

parameters.name: Name
parameters.description: Statutory instruments with the name specified

parameters.name: Procedure
parameters.description: Statutory instruments made under the specified procedure

parameters.name: ScheduledDebate
parameters.description: Statutory instrument which contains a scheduled debate

parameters.name: MotionToStop
parameters.description: Statutory instruments which contains a motion to stop

parameters.name: ConcernsRaisedByCommittee
parameters.description: Statutory instruments which contains concerns raised by committee

parameters.name: ParliamentaryProcessConcluded
parameters.description: Statutory instruments where the parliamentary process is concluded or notconcluded

parameters.name: DepartmentId
parameters.description: Statutory instruments with the department ID specified

parameters.name: LayingBodyId
parameters.description: Statutory instruments with the laying body ID specified

parameters.name: RecommendedForProcedureChange
parameters.description: Statutory instruments recommended for procedure change

parameters.name: ActOfParliamentId
parameters.description: Statutory instruments with the Act of Parliament ID specified

parameters.name: House
parameters.description: Statutory instruments laid in the house specified

parameters.name: Skip
parameters.description: The number of records to skip from the first, default is 0

parameters.name: Take
parameters.description: The number of records to return, default is 20

get.summary: Get individual statutory instrument or proposed negative by id

parameters.name: instrumentId
parameters.description: Id of instrument requested

get.summary: Get business items associated with a particular instrument

parameters.name: instrumentId
parameters.description: Id of instrument to get business items for

get.summary: Get business items associated with a particular timeline

parameters.name: timelineId
parameters.description: Id of timeline to get business items for

statutoryInstrumentId.description: Instrument associated with the business item

sequence.description: Order in which the business was conducted

commonsLayingDate.description: Date paper was laid in House of Commons

lordsLayingDate.description: Date paper was laid in House of Lords

paperComingIntoForceNote.description: Note associated with instrument coming into force

enablingActs.description: Acts of Parliament enabling the instrument

timelines.description: Procedure step timelines of the instrument

link.description: Link to the full wording of the instrument

commonsLayingDate.description: Date paper was laid in House of Commons

lordsLayingDate.description: Date paper was laid in House of Lords
